name: Americania
description:
Americania is a political simulation with RPG elements. You are the president of a recently independent south american nation. You must guide your new democracy into the modern age, using diplomacy as a weapon and making the rules of your newborn country... Or you can use power to conquer the continent, having no respect for life and international rules.

Features:

- Random events

- Compete to be re-elected against random opponents

- Industrialize your country

- Abolish slavery or face sanctions of the British Empire

- Deal with powerful neighbors

- Fight in the Triple Alliance War

- Up to 4 hours of content with replay factor

- International congresses

- And much more!

This is my first published game, I plan to add some updates as time passes, as well as little corrections.

Check out my main project on Twitter: @SpaceOpera_game
